meta.title: Leandro Damasio. Welcome to My Personal Page
desc: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with a proven track record in architecting and delivering scalable, high-performance web applications. Deep expertise in both robust backend development (Python/Golang) and dynamic frontend implementation (React), complemented by a strong DevOps mindset. Proficient in designing efficient data collection and storage solutions, implementing comprehensive infrastructure automation and CI/CD pipelines, establishing proactive monitoring strategies, and optimizing application performance through strategic caching and architectural best practices.

In addition to core full-stack and DevOps capabilities, I possess extensive experience across technologies critical for modern software development and data-intensive applications. This includes orchestrating containerized environments with Kubernetes and managing ML workflows using Kubeflow. I excel at leveraging big data tools such as Hadoop and Spark for scalable data processing and analysis, underpinned by strong Linux and cloud proficiency across AWS, GCP, and Azure. My database expertise spans both relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL solutions (MongoDB, Redis), further enhanced by comprehensive understanding of software architecture principles including microservices, serverless, and event-driven systems. Additionally, I implement robust monitoring and logging solutions using tools like Prometheus and the ELK stack, ensuring system reliability and providing actionable insights.

Complementing my technical expertise, I demonstrate strong leadership within multidisciplinary teams, successfully guiding the development and delivery of scalable products from conception to deployment. My collaborative approach fosters effective communication and empowers team members to achieve ambitious goals. I am particularly dedicated to harnessing technology for innovation and addressing meaningful challenges, as evidenced by my commitment to contributing to startup growth and exploring solutions for social impact. This experience has cultivated a proactive, results-oriented mindset, consistently focused on delivering high-quality solutions that align with strategic objectives and exceed stakeholder expectations.

With over a decade of experience as a software developer, I possess a robust mastery of diverse programming languages (Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Java, Go, PHP) and frameworks (Django, FastAPI, React, Node.js, Laravel), coupled with deep expertise in DevOps and cloud technologies (Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Istio, Docker, AWS, GCP, Azure). Furthermore, I have a solid foundation in data engineering, with experience in designing solutions for real-time storage and processing of large data volumes. My passion for well-structured software architecture, evidenced by the consistent application of SOLID principles and Extreme Programming, has driven a proven track record of delivering efficient, secure, and scalable RESTful and GraphQL APIs, along with comprehensive experience in messaging systems, task scheduling, and infrastructure management. As a highly organized and collaborative problem-solver with a passion for innovation, I consistently deliver high-quality results in multidisciplinary teams.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.desc: Passionate Full-Stack Software Engineer and Tech Lead with a strong focus on technology and innovation, experienced in DevOps, AI/ML, and scalable solutions (Kubernetes, Kubeflow, Machine Learning, Hadoop, Spark, Linux, Cloud, Blockchain, PostgreSQL, Python, Django, FastAPI, React, Next.js). Solid track record in team leadership and product development, focused on startup growth and solutions for social challenges. Expertise in high-performance web application architecture, backend (Python/Golang), frontend (React), DevOps, automation, CI/CD, monitoring, and optimization. Extensive experience in big data technologies, databases (SQL/NoSQL), and architectural principles (microservices, serverless). Strong leadership, effective communication, and a focus on delivering high-quality results. Over a decade of experience in diverse languages/frameworks and data engineering. Passionate about well-structured architecture and delivering scalable APIs. Organized and collaborative problem-solver with a passion for innovation.
aboutMe.bio: Leandro Damasio began his career as an Engineer in the 1990s, with the PHP language. Since then, he has distinguished himself as an experienced and innovative software engineer, working on development projects for major companies and institutions such as FAPESP, NPL Brasil, Global Hitss, Arte Arena, and Stefanini.

highlights.name: Financial Fraud Detection RF XGBoost
highlights.description: This project focuses on developing a robust fraud detection system using machine learning algorithms. It compares the performance of two popular ensemble methods: Random Forest and XGBoost, in classifying financial transactions as fraudulent or legitimate. The models are trained and evaluated on a real-world financial dataset.
highlights.technologies: random forest, xgboost, scikit-learn, pandas, numpy

highlights.description: Sales management software with product catalog and customer data capture.

highlights.name: GPT4 LangChain Chatbot
highlights.description: This project showcases the development of an intelligent chatbot using the powerful GPT-4 language model and the LangChain framework. It demonstrates how to build a conversational AI capable of understanding and responding to user queries in a natural and engaging way.

highlights.name: MSX API v1.0
highlights.description: A RESTful API in Python, using FastAPI, that allows the creation, reading, updating, and deletion of vehicle records, with basic authentication and automatic documentation features. It was built with TDD and uses libraries such as pydantic, SQL Alchemy, Alembic, PyJWT, argon2.
highlights.technologies: python, fastapi, sql alchemy, alembic, pyjwt, argon2, pydantic
